I am thankful that Elder [J. N.] Loughborough can still use his abilities and his gifts in God's work.  He has stood faithful amid storm and trial.  With Elder Smith, my husband, Brother Butler, who joined us at a later period, and yourself [S. N. Haskell], he can say, "That which was from the beginning, . . . that which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with 
                                                                           21
the Father, and with His son Jesus Christ" (1 John 1:1-3).  -- 2SM 224-226.
